original_text: His own house where he was to dwell, in the other court back of the hall, was of like workmanship. Solomon also made a house like this hall for Pharaoh's daughter whom he had taken in marriage.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 거처할 왕궁은 그 주랑 뒤 다른 뜰에 있으니 그 양식이 동일하며 솔로몬이 또 그가 장가 든 바로의 딸을 위하여 집을 지었는데 이 주랑과 같더라

sentences.original_text: His own house where he was to dwell
in the other court back of the hall
Solomon also made a house like this hall
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬은 또한 이 홀과 같은 집을 지었다

sentences.original_text: whom he had taken in marriage
